verses.content: David chun tlâng sîp lâwn suokna a khêl dep chun, ngai ta, Mephiboseth siehlaw Ziba chun a lo tuok a, sabengtung pahni a hmang a, bei tlang zahni le grêp emṭâwl bâwr za le nipui thei za le uoin peng khat ân phurtir a.

Chun, lal chun Ziba kuoma chun, “Hieng hi iengtizie am a nih a?” a ta. Ziba chun, “Sabengtunghai hi lal sûnghai chuongna ding nîng a ta, bei le nipui theihai hi tlangvâlhai fâk ding nîng a ta; uoin hi chu thlalêra châu taphawthai dâwn ding nîng a tih,” a ta.

Chun, lal chun “Anleh, i pu naupa chu khâwlai am?” a ta. Ziba chun lal kuomah, “Ngai ta, Jerusa- lemah a um, ‘Vawisûn hin Israel- hai chun ka pa ram an mi pêk nâwk ding a nih,’ a ti nghe nghe annâw,” a ta.

Chun, lal chun Ziba kuoma chun, “Ngai ta, Mephiboseth thil nei po po chu i ta vawng a ni tah,” a ta. Chun, Ziba chun, “Chibai ka bûk takzet che a nih, aw lalpa ka pu, i mit tlunga um pei tum ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, lal Davidin Bahurim a tlung chun, ngai ta, Saula sûnghai laia mi Gera naupa a hming Simei a hung suok a, ṭawngsie inphur pum peiin a hung suok a.
David chu lungin a dêng a, lal David siehlawhai po po khawm chu; chun, mipui po po le sipai huoisenhai po po chu a changtieng le a vawitieng an um a.
Chun, Simei chun ṭawngsie ân phur sûng chun hieng hin a hril a, “Fe hmang dai rawh, fe hmang dai rawh, nang thisen insuo hmang le Belial mihriempa,

a rorêl âi i rêl tah Saula sûnghai thisen chu LALPAIN i chungah a hung inlettir tah a; chun, LALPAIN ram chu i naupa Absalom chu a pêk tah a; chun, ngai ta, thisen insuo- hmang i ni leiin nangma pawi chu nang bawkin i tâwk a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Zeruia naupa Abisai chun lal kuomah, “Iengdinga hi ui thitlaw hin ka lalpa lal chu ṭawngsie ân phur mei mei am a nih a? a lu va tan el ka tih aw?” a ta.

Nisienlakhawm, lal chun, “Nangni Zeruia naupasalhai, nangni mi lo hrietpêk ding ieng am a um a? LALPAIN a kuomah, ‘David chu ṭawngsie inphur rawh,’ a ti si chun inphur el raw se, ‘Iengdinga chuong anga i thaw am a ni leh?’ tuin am ti hlak an ta?” a ta.

Chun, David chun Abisai le a siehlawhai po po kuoma chun, “Ngai ta u, ka naupa ka rîla ra ngei chun mi that a tum a na, hi Benjamin mi hin a va tum nasa nâwk zuol âwm de! Ieng- khawm law naw unla, ṭawngsie chu inphur el raw se; LALPA inthawtir a ni sih a.
LALPA chun ka rimsikzie hi hung hmûng a ta. LALPA chun vawi- sûna hienga ṭawngsie a mîn phur hi a ṭha tiengin a mi hung thung el khawm a ni thei a nih,” a ta.

Chuongchun, David le a mihai chu lampuia chun an fe pei tah a; chun, Simei chu an râla tlâng panga chun a fe ve pei a, a fe malam chun ṭawngsie chu ân phur pei a, lunghai dâmin a dêng a, pilvut dâmin a theh a.
Chun, lal le a kuoma mi um po pohai chun Aiphim an tlung a, chu- taka chun an châwldam tah a.
Chun, Absalom le mipui po po, Israel mihai chu Jerusalemah an feh a, chun, a kuomah Ahithophel khawm a ṭhang a.
Ark mi Husai, David ruolpa chun Absalom kuom a tlung chun, Husai chun Absalom kuomah, “Pa- thienin laltak humhim raw se, Pathienin laltak humhim raw se,” a ta.
Chun, Absalom chun Husai kuomah, “Hieng ang hi a ni maw i ruol i lunginsiet dân chu? Iengdinga i ruolpa kuoma i fe naw am?” a ta.
Chun, Husai chun Absalom kuomah, “Fe naw ning ah, LALPA le hieng mipui le Israelhaiin an ithlang thu thuin um ka ta, a kuomah um lem ka tih.
Chun, tu rawng am ka bâwl ding a na? Naupa hmaah rawng ka bâwl ding a ni naw am a nih? I pa hmaa rawng ka bâwl ang khan i hmaah bâwl ka tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Absalom chun Ahithophel kuoma chun, “Iengtin am ka thaw ding a na, i ngaidân hril ta?” a ta.

Chun, Ahithophel chun Absa- lom kuomah, “I pa thaikêm in nghâk- a siea umhai kuoma chun va lût rawh; chun, Israel mi po poin i pain a thîm che ti hrieng an ta, chuong- chun, nanga tienga ṭhang po po- hai kut chu a hung hrât ding a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Absalom ta ding chun in chungah puon in an zar a; chuongchun, Israel mi po pohai mithmuah a pa thâikêmhai kuoma chun a lût a.
Chuong laia rem a ruot, Ahithophel remruothai chu, Pathien thu ngai anga ngai a ni hlak a, chuong ang bawk chun, Ahithophelin David le Absalom rem a ruotpuihai po po chu ngai a ni hlak.
